message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1800000. This is a great deal, considering its value to me is at least $1200000. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is important to you, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1600000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $1600000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1700000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the value of the product to me. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. However, based on my budget constraints, I am unable to go above $1600000 for the product. I believe we might be able to reach an agreement closer to this amount. Let me know if there's any possibility of further negotiation.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1650000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value of the product to me. I hope this revised offer is more acceptable to you.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my financial situation, I am willing to consider $1600000 as the maximum I can pay for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

I understand that $1600000 is your maximum offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'll sell the product to you for $1625000. This is my final offer, and I hope you'll consider it seriously.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a mutually agreeable price. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $1600000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I've already made several concessions, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower than $1625000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
